channel.title: Please help!
channel.description: whenever i try to go onto hoodscape or any server, it says " This Server is down, please Click cancel and click Start Server, i keep doing this and i cannot get on. can someone please help. but the server wasnt down because my friend was onthe same server at his house. Im using firefox, will this efect it in anyway? PLEASE HELP!!! :( :mad:

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @azn_pker1 azn pker1
item.description:
@azn_pker1 wrote:

DO NOT DOUBLE POST, You Go To the Rs2 Private Server Advertisement, go to 1 of the threads, and they will post their server on it, Copy Down the ip on “Server IP:”, Some require hamachi tho, u can download it, Here

If its error AGAIN, Then that means its updating, coding, or its offline
